idea:
UnoLigo is an innovative Customer Transmigration Management platform that unifies customer interaction from various non-voice channels and voice channels.

 UnoLigo's key differentiator is the AI/ML layer that automates manual tasks like classification, assignment, monitoring, alerting and escalation etc. This automation could result in a 50% optimisation in agent performance at customer contact centres savings of thousands of dollars every month thru a reduction in error because of automated workflows.
name: UNOLIGO SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

MNB Electrical and Engineers is a professional contracting firm offering complete engineering

Mechanical Contracting, is the Client assurance of our professionalism accompanied with our

Our detailed engineering and knowledge of the Industry enable us to work with our clients,

understand their requirement and present most innovative, cost effective solutions.
name: MNB ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING LLP

idea:
Pipa Farms LLP is a Limited Liability Company that deals in Agriculture and Farming related products and activities. Pipa Farms aim is to build a organic Farms using new techniques like Aquaponics, hydroponics and also the Natural Organic Farming which will act as a workshop and training centres for all the Farmers in India. We are just not the Farmers growing product. We will Make Farmers understand the importance and true value of the product. Pipa Farms will teach the Farmers what products can be made from their products which can be sold in Market at higher price.

For Example

Cotton Farming.

Farmers who are growing cotton , we will teach them to make products from those cotton as well.

Like they can make a khadi fabric . we will teach them to use Charkha and handlooms . or they can make beds, pillow etc which can be easily learnt. A group of Farmer of one Village can form union and we will form a small unit of factory or workshop in that village and will teach them to make fabric or products from the raw material that they grow in their farm. Not only training , Pipa Farms will also sell those products for them so that they can get a good price.

Each Village need to form a unit where in after growing the Crop in Farm ,womens of that village will make the product. This will act as a great way to balance the society.

Pipa Farm aims to create a Mini industries in each village so that that village is self sustainable.

Vision

Pipa Farms LLP vision is to teach all the farmers the true value of the products they grow. We aim to make all the Farmers self dependent and Self Reliable.


Mission

Pipa Farms LLP Mission is to have a office and a workshop unit set in each village of India. Our Mission is to Make the local economy and Village structure strong.
name: PIPA FARMS LLP
